name: grid-template-parser
description: A simple CSS Grid template parser

scripts.build: npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min
scripts.build:umd: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=development webpack src/index.js dist/grid-template-parser.js
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=production webpack src/index.js dist/grid-template-parser.min.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run lint && npm test && npm run build
